about_the_game:
3 Shots Left is an atmospheric horror set in an English village and the countryside surrounding it.

It's six months into the apocalypse and you've settled into a lonely routine. You maintain defences against the undead and survive off of a dwindling supply of food. One night a mysterious stranger contacts you over the radio with a suspicious offer. How will you survive with... 3 Shots Left?

Playtime: Around 90-120 minutes

Features:

  • First person walking simulator. Your village is an open area and will take some time to get familiar with.
  • Limited Combat. Over the course of the game you can fire your shotgun 3 times. Slay the undead... or perhaps find other uses for your gun. Make your shots count!
  • Focus on atmosphere, vibes, and lite choices. Over the course of the story you will choose what to shoot, piece together the things that happen and who the mysterious stranger is, and enjoy a lonely apocalypse.

content_descriptors.notes:
Constant supernatural and psychological threat (from zombies and other apocalypse survivors).

Occasional scenes of fantasy / bodily mutilation (zombies and animals).

Non-explicit references alcoholism.
